long_description: Bring enough chalk for your whole climbing crew in the prAna Bucket Bag chalk bag. Fleece-lined chalk compartment protects hands; double-drawcord closure helps prevent spills on the hike up. Brush-holder pockets give you a spot to stash your brushes for cleaning off holds (brushes not included). prAna Bucket Bag rip-and-stick stash pocket holds your keys while you climb. Chalk sold separately.
short_description: Bring enough chalk for your whole climbing crew in the prAna Bucket Bag chalk bag.
